document.full_text: consumers paid more for gas and food in april, pushing inflation to its highest level in two and a half years. but so far this month, inflationary pressures have begun to ease.
document.title: rising food and gas costs push up consumer prices
lines_and_colors: consumers paid more for gas and food in april, pushing inflation to its highest level in two and a half years. but so far this month, inflationary pressures have begun to ease.
